resources.string:
"Hyperion Mobile App Terms and Conditions of Use"
"Welcome to the Hyperion mobile application (hereinafter, the "Application"). These terms and conditions (hereinafter, the "Terms") establish the conditions of use of the Application. By using the Application, you agree to these Terms in their entirety. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the Application.
Application Object The Application is a service of [description of the service offered by the application]. The Hyperion company owns the Application and reserves all rights to the Application. Terms of use By using the Application, you agree to the following conditions:
A. You are responsible for your use of the Application. You may not use the Application for illegal or unauthorized purposes.
B. You may not use the Application in any way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the Application or interfere with its use by other users.
C. You may not use the Application to send junk mail, spam or any other type of unsolicited communication. d. You may not copy, modify, or distribute content from the Application without the express permission of Hyperion.
Intellectual property The Application and all its content, including but not limited to text, graphics, images, videos, logos and software, are protected by intellectual property laws.
The Hyperion company owns all intellectual property rights in the Application. Privacy Hyperion respects your privacy and complies with all applicable data protection laws. The personal information that you provide to the Application will be used only for the purposes provided in the Privacy Policy of the Application.
By using the Application, you agree to our Privacy Policy. Limitation of Liability Hyperion shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages, including, but not limited to, damages for lost profits, business interruption, loss of information, or other pecuniary damages, resulting from the use or inability to use of the Application.
Changes to the Terms Hyperion reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. If we change these Terms, we will notify you through the Application or by email. If you do not agree to the modified Terms, you must stop using the Application. Governing Law and Jurisdiction These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [country where the Hyperion company is registered]. Any dispute arising in connection with these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of [city where Hyperion company is registered]. By using the Application, you agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of [city where Hyperion company is registered] for any disputes arising in connection with these Terms.
Termination Hyperion reserves the right to terminate your access to the Application at any time and without notice if you breach these Terms.
General disposition If any provision of these Terms is held invalid or unenforceable, that provision will be construed in accordance with applicable law to reflect, to the extent possible, the original intent of the parties and the other provisions will remain valid and enforceable. Hyperion's waiver of any provision of these Terms shall not be deemed a further or continuing waiver of that provision or any other provision. These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and Hyperion in relation to the Application and supersede all prior or contemporaneous agreements between you and Hyperion in relation to the Application.
If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us via [email or Application contact form]. Effective Date: [effective date of the Terms].
Thank you for using the Hyperion Application." "
